Game.Name: SpongeBob SquarePants - SuperSponge (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: The Game Boy Advance verson was released on December 31st 2002. The game was also released as part of a Nickelodeon 4 game compilation on March 14th 2007 Story Spongebob wants to get a autographed photo of Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy for his friend Patrick for a birthday present. The two elderly superheros want nothing to do with Spongebob and instead they sent him to find random objects around Bikini Bottom.Cheat: Easy win against final bossWhen you are facing the final boss, go to the very left. If you stay there the boss cannot harm you in any way. To defeat the boss, just keep on jumping and pressing B.
Game.Notes: Hoppin' Clams! SpongeBob wants to give his friend Patrick Star an autograph from their favorite superheroes Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy, for his birthday. Help SpongeBob fulfill the quest to win their autographs!
